speech.value: Yes, pretty much continuously. So, I’d write, I’d submit, I get it knocked back, I’d go off and write another one. And basically, I turned out a book, an unsuccessful book a year for about 15 years, until I finally had what I was definitely thinking of as my last great try at getting published with Empire in Black and Gold and the next couple of books. And thankfully, they attracted the attention of an agent, and he was able to get me a publisher.
